attributes.action: stop introducing more and more GCSE subjects which can sometimes be of lower standard and increase the standards in the traditional subjects such as english, or science.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Frequently, the government announces new initiatives such as teaching languages at primary school or a new subject such as citizenship. This takes up time/resources which could be spent teaching the foundation subjects or vocational subjects.
It is better if a person has a greater ability in Maths rather than a citizenship qualification.
